Finally run php artisan queue:listen to have my app call to the queue.

pre.code: //Homestead.yaml in root of your Homestead Vagrant install sites: - map: beanstalkd.dev to: /home/vagrant/Code/beanstalk_console/public
#on my local box not in vagrant > vagrant provision

p.p: Just make sure to match 127.0.0.1 to what the domain above or what ever you want
Then in the vagrant box make sure beanstalkd is running ideally every time you start the box. Which by default the box does this.

Finally you should be able to go tohttp://beanstalkd.dev:8000/ and see
